title: Black!! Transformation
synopsis: Kohtaro Minami, a youth on the run from the mysterious organization known as Golgom, begins to awaken into a horrifying new form granted to them due to their greater plans for him; making him choose to use it instead to fight them as Kamen Rider Black.

title: Monster Party
synopsis: Kohtaro looks for his step-brother Nobuhiko Akizuki and plans to track down Golgom's headquarters.

title: Strange? Strange Cyborg
synopsis: Kohtaro investigates a bizarre string of abductions in conjunction with a scheme by Bishum to bring him down.

title: The Devil's Laboratory
synopsis: A cycling friend of Kohtaro becomes the subject of Golgom's mad doctor experimenting to find a weakness to their escaped subject.

title: Run Through the Maze, Kohtaro
synopsis: Kohtaro investigates a town being brainwashed by a Goat kaijin, hoping to control it for Golgom to ruin an international peace conference.

title: The Secret Clairvoyance Mystery
synopsis: Kohtaro must rescue two artists abducted by Golgom to become psychic spies in order to ruin the development of technology for civilization's collapse.

title: The Restored Organism Mecha
synopsis: A man who hates rampaging gangs is seduced by Golgom to gain the power to eliminate them, forcing Kohtaro to rescue him for the sake of his sister.

title: The Devil's Trill
synopsis: Kohtaro must save a musician girl whose feelings of failure lead to her becoming a member of Gorgom's plot to control the world through music.

title: Bishum's Red Lips
synopsis: When a girl makes a deal with Bishum to distribute strange pendants in order to help Golgom conquer the city, Kohtaro tries to put a stop to this deception.

title: Where's Nobuhiko?
synopsis: Kohtaro investigates suspicious auto accidents leading to the victims being used for Golgom's army for causing chaos throughout the world.

title: Starved Monsters
synopsis: The Gorgom's plan to grow fruit for their mutants causes plants to sprout on people all over the city.

title: The Super Machine Legend is Born
synopsis: Kohtaro discovers the whereabouts of a missing biker, who is raising his son to ride and protect the ultimate bike devised by his father.

title: Mama's the Monster Raising Official
synopsis: Gorgom kidnaps mothers to nurture its army of mutants, and BLACK finds himself facing an implacable enemy.

title: The Day Tuna Disappeared
synopsis: Kohtaro fights to stop the abduction of tuna by Professor Kuromatsu in order to gain an extract to improve the power of the Gorgom mutants.

title: The Targeted Bizarre Academy
synopsis: Kohtaro tries to stop a Golgom scheme of using schools to mold children into model students to assist in their control of Earth.

title: Kyoko's Strange Dream
synopsis: Golgom manipulate the dreams of Nobuhiko's sister Kyoko in order to use her life energy to save an ailing Shadow Moon.

title: Holy Sword Bilgenia!!
synopsis: Golgom's Creation King forces the release of a powerful yet rebellious swordsman, who decides to try and take down Kohtaro on his own terms.

title: The Limit-Reaching Hellish Trap
synopsis: Bilgenia takes the guise of the doomed Professor Kuromatsu in order to lead Kohtaro into a trap for his defeat.

title: Crash! Two Great Machines

title: The Black Shadow That Attacks Papa
synopsis: A boy with psychic powers becomes forewarned into thinking that Kohtaro is going to harm his father even as Gorgom is secretly using him.

title: Marmo's Magic Power
synopsis: When a head of a two-headed ammonite Mutant becomes detached by Kamen Rider Black, it ends up with a young boy and it becomes his new pet.

title: The Female College Student's Nightmare
synopsis: Kohtaro must save Katsumi and other college girls from a professor turned Golgom Mutant hoping to add more females to the mutant army.

title: Save the Super-Powered Girl

title: The Fire-Spouting Dangerous Highway
synopsis: Kohtaro must avoid the dangers of the Gorgom priests and an electricity controlling Mutant in order to restore power for a kid who needs vital surgery.

title: The Scarab That Invites Hell
synopsis: Bilgenia uses a scarab beetle Mutant to create a craze for its minions, forcing Kohtaro into a corner in trying to stem this greedy obsession.

title: The Target's a Death Mask?
synopsis: Kohtaro must rescue four Japanese astronauts when they're abducted and replaced with doll-like clones controlled by the Armadillo Mutant.

title: Aloha to an Assassin!
synopsis: When a special female assassin is created by Golgom in Hawaii and sent to Japan to go after Kohtaro, Ryusuke Taki returns to help deal with protecting them.

title: Burn! Boy Warriors
synopsis: The Golgom Boy Warriors reunite with Kohtaro to help save children being abducted by Golgom to create a new, stronger generation of child warriors.

title: Memories of Yubari's Sky

title: Riddle!? The EP-Party Boy Squad
synopsis: When Golgom creates a new political party claiming they'll bring about peace, Kohtaro investigates and discovers a nefarious plot using this guise.

title: The Idol's Evil Power
synopsis: Bishum uses the identity of a girl to turn a mutant into an idol hypnotizing her fans into Golgom's mentality while tricking Kohtaro into believing she is still innocent.

title: The Karate Master's Secret
synopsis: In pursuit of a destructive Salamander Mutant, Kohtaro encounters a peculiar karate master in the woods training a boy to be a fighter.

synopsis: A boy grieving over his father's death by Gorgom becomes abducted by two samurai thrown out of time by a Mutant's magic time-controlling box.

title: The Sea is in My Closet
synopsis: A boy accidentally intercepts a signal associated with Baraom's warp device, forcing Kohtaro to protect him and stop Golgom's plan to use it to sink Japan.

title: The Rider Dies!
synopsis: With a limited time before the end of the Creation King, Kohtaro and Shadow Moon are forced to finally have their ultimate showdown, where only one will be victorious.

title: A Bouquet of Reminiscence into the Ocean
synopsis: With Kohtaro dead and Golgom standing victorious over a burning Japan, Kyoko and Katsumi try to survive until they escape their home, even as a miraculous event is occurring within the ocean.

title: Fierce Fighting! Darom's Death
synopsis: Reviving from his defeat against Shadow Moon, Kohtaro discovers the current state of Japan since Golgom's victory as Darom targets his elimination to complete Shadow Moon's final ascension.

title: The Creation King's True Identity?
synopsis: Finally reaching Golgom's headquarters, Kohtaro confronts Shadow Moon a final time as the Creation King forces the former brothers to complete their final showdown.

title: Gorgom's Last Day
synopsis: The final battle between Black Sun and Shadow Moon comes to a bittersweet end as the final fates of Kohtaro, Nobuhiko and the Creation King are finally determined.

title: Kamen Rider Black: Hurry to Onigashima
synopsis: Kohtaro travels to a remote island and uses his abilities as Kamen Rider Black to save the kids and foil Gorgom's latest evil scheme.

title: Kamen Rider Black: Terrifying! The Phantom House of Devil Pass
synopsis: As Kamen Rider Black, Kohtaro travels to Yubari to save Makino's family and liberate the town from Shadow Moon's evil grasp.
